#### Import data

```{r}
library(readr)
shark_controlprogram <- read_csv("../data/shark-controlprogram.csv")
View(shark_controlprogram)
```

#### Making the data tidy

Removing NAs from our dataset to clean it 
```{r}
# Remove rows with any NA values using base R
shark_clean <- na.omit(shark_controlprogram)
```
